hero.title: Trade like a Korean Quant
hero.subtitle: With quantitative models from renowned quantitative team laboratories and strict risk control, ordinary investors can also have institutional-level trading capabilities.
hero.subtitleHighlight: We don't predict the future, we only calculate probabilities.

kModel.title: K-Model Resonance Engine
kModel.description: No longer relying on a single indicator. We simultaneously monitor 15m / 1H / 4H multi-timeframe signals, and only trigger trades when trends resonate, significantly reducing market noise misjudgment.

aiTrading.title: DL-Signal Deep Learning
aiTrading.description: Signal filter trained on LSTM and Transformer architectures. Effectively identifies false breakouts and extreme market structures, avoiding liquidation in black swan events.

riskControl.title: Risk Budgeting Control
riskControl.description: Control losses, not profits. The system has built-in strict drawdown budgets and automatic exposure reduction mechanisms (De-risking), ensuring capital safety always takes precedence over profit growth.

signalProcessing.title: Signal Processing Engine
signalProcessing.description: Supports TradingView Webhook signal integration, real-time processing of multi-strategy signals, intelligent routing and execution, ensuring timely signal response.

multiExchange.title: Multi-Exchange Support
multiExchange.description: Integrates with major multiple exchanges, unified interface management, supports spot and derivatives trading, flexible trading rule configuration.

basic.name: Basic Plan
basic.description: Suitable for low-cost validation of system stability

pro.name: Pro Quant Plan
pro.description: Custom for large capital users and institutions

enterprise.title: Exchange, Studio, or Asset Management Institution?
enterprise.description: We provide white-label systems, API signal integration, and customized risk control solutions.

footer.description:
Originated from Korean quantitative lab, serving global crypto investors.
Replace emotion with data, fight human nature with systems.

Based in Seoul & Singapore.
footer.risk: Important Risk Warning: Cryptocurrency trading carries extremely high market risks. All strategies, signals, and backtest data provided by Crypto-K Quants are for reference only and do not constitute any investment advice. Past returns do not represent future performance. Users should always independently control account permissions and bear the risk of capital losses from copy trading. This service does not provide 'principal guarantee' or 'profit guarantee' services.

section1.title: 1. Introduction
section1.content: Crypto-K Quants (hereinafter referred to as "we", "this platform") values user privacy protection. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your personal information. By using our services, you agree to the contents of this policy.

section2.title: 2. Information Collection
section2.content: We may collect the following types of information:
section2.item1: Account Information: Email, username, etc. provided during registration
section2.item2: Trading Information: Exchange API keys (encrypted storage), trading records, strategy subscription information
section2.item3: Technical Information: IP address, device information, browser type, access logs
section2.item4: Usage Data: Service usage, feature preferences
section2.item5: Communication Information: Content of your communications with us through customer service channels

section3.title: 3. Information Use
section3.content: We use the collected information for:
section3.item1: Providing, maintaining, and improving our quantitative trading services
section3.item2: Processing your trading requests and strategy subscriptions
section3.item3: Sending service notifications, updates, and security alerts
section3.item4: Conducting data analysis to optimize service performance

section4.title: 4. Information Sharing
section4.content: We do not sell your personal information to third parties. We may share information only in the following circumstances: (1) with your explicit consent; (2) as required by laws and regulations; (3) when necessary to provide services, sharing with trusted third-party service providers (such as cloud services, payment processors), and these providers have committed to protecting your information.

section5.title: 5. Data Security
section5.content: We use industry-standard security measures to protect your information, including encrypted transmission (HTTPS), encrypted storage of sensitive data, access controls, etc. However, please note that internet transmission and storage systems cannot guarantee 100% security, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

section6.title: 6. Data Retention
section6.content: We retain your personal information only for as long as necessary to provide services. When you delete your account, we will delete or anonymize your personal information unless laws and regulations require us to retain it.

section7.title: 7. Your Rights
section7.content: You have the right to: (1) access, correct, or delete your personal information; (2) withdraw consent; (3) request data portability; (4) file complaints or reports. To exercise these rights, please contact us through customer service channels.

section8.title: 8. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
section8.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve user experience and analyze service usage. You can manage cookie preferences through browser settings, but this may affect the use of some features.

section9.title: 9. Contact Us
section9.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us through the contact information provided on the website. We reserve the right to update this policy at any time, and the updated policy will be posted on the website.

section1.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
section1.content: Welcome to Crypto-K Quants (hereinafter referred to as "this platform", "we") quantitative trading services. By accessing or using this platform, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use the service.

section2.title: 2. Service Description
section2.content: This platform provides the following services:
section2.item2: Trading signal push and API copy trading services
section2.item3: Risk management and trade execution tools
section2.item4: Related technical support and consulting services

section3.title: 3. User Accounts
section3.content: You need to register an account to use this service. You are responsible for: (1) providing accurate and complete registration information; (2) maintaining the security and accuracy of account information; (3) being responsible for all activities under your account; (4) immediately notifying us of any unauthorized use. We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these terms.

section4.title: 4. Risk Warning
section4.content: Cryptocurrency trading carries extremely high market risks and may result in total or partial loss of funds. Strategies, signals, and backtest data provided by this platform are for reference only and do not constitute any investment advice. Past returns do not represent future performance. You should fully understand the relevant risks and make decisions carefully based on your own situation. We are not responsible for any trading losses.

section5.title: 5. Service Fees
section5.content: Using certain services on this platform may require payment of subscription fees. Fee standards will be clearly posted on the website. All fees, once paid, are non-refundable except as required by law. We reserve the right to adjust prices at any time, but this will not affect already active subscription periods.

section6.title: 6. User Conduct
section6.content: You agree not to: (1) use this service to engage in any illegal activities; (2) interfere with or disrupt the normal operation of the service; (3) access other users' accounts or systems without authorization; (4) spread malware, viruses, or harmful code; (5) engage in any behavior that may harm this platform or third-party interests.

section7.title: 7. Intellectual Property
section7.content: All content on this platform, including but not limited to software, algorithms, strategies, text, graphics, trademarks, etc., is protected by intellectual property laws. Without our explicit written permission, you may not copy, modify, distribute, or commercially use this content.

section8.title: 8. Disclaimer
section8.content: This service is provided "as is" without any express or implied warranties. We do not guarantee the continuity, accuracy, completeness, or suitability of the service. We are not liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from the use or inability to use this service.

section9.title: 9. Service Changes and Termination
section9.content: We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or terminate all or part of the service at any time without prior notice. We are not responsible for any losses caused by service changes, suspension, or termination.

section10.title: 10. Applicable Law and Dispute Resolution
section10.content: These terms are governed by applicable law. In case of disputes, both parties should first resolve them through friendly negotiation. If negotiation fails, the dispute should be submitted to a court with jurisdiction for resolution.
